H0.text: Height of the plants is what the student should measure to determine which type of soil the plant will grow best.

H1.text: Weight of the soil is the measurement the student should take to determine which type of soil a plant will grow best.

H2.text: The amount of water used is what the student should measure to determine which type of soil a plant will grow best.

H3.text: The temperature of the room should be measured to determine which type of soil a plant will grow best.

A4.text: The total water used in an agricultural field includes surface runoff, drainage and consumptive use.
